code: import{ADDED,ALLCOMPLETED,CLEARCOMPLETED,COLORSELECTED,DELETED,LOADED,TOGGLED}from"./actionTypes";export var loaded=function loaded(todos){return{type:LOADED,payload:todos};};export var added=function added(todoText){return{type:ADDED,payload:todoText};};export var toggled=function toggled(todoId){return{type:TOGGLED,payload:todoId};};export var colorSelected=function colorSelected(todoId,color){return{type:COLORSELECTED,payload:{todoId:todoId,color:color}};};export var deleted=function deleted(todoId){return{type:DELETED,payload:todoId};};export var allCompleted=function allCompleted(){return{type:ALLCOMPLETED};};export var clearCompleted=function clearCompleted(){return{type:CLEARCOMPLETED};};
